item.name: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management Subcommittee
Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management Subcommittee

item.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.
Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of General Services to: (1) take necessary action to have the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) vacate the building located at 600 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW, in the District of Columbia, make that building available for occupancy by the National Gallery of Art, and relocate the FTC; and (2) reconstruct the building to meet the Gallery's requirements.

bill.title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to take such action as may be necessary to have the Federal Trade Commission vacate the building located at 600 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW, in the District of Columbia and to make that building available for occupancy by the National Gallery of Art.

item.title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to take such action as may be necessary to have the Federal Trade Commission vacate the building located at 600 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW, in the District of Columbia and to make that building available for occupancy by the National Gallery of Art.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
